17 class RTPStreamPCMInfo : public PCMInfo {
18  public:
19 
20  RTPStreamPCMInfo() = default;
21  virtual void begin(AudioStream& stream) { p_stream = &stream; }
22  int getSampleRate() override { return p_stream->audioInfo().sample_rate; }
23  int getChannels() override{ return p_stream->audioInfo().channels; }
24  int getSampleSizeBytes() override { return p_stream->audioInfo().bits_per_sample / 8; };
25  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo ai) { p_stream->setAudioInfo(ai); }
26 
27  protected:
28  AudioStream* p_stream = nullptr;
29 };
30 
38 class RTPPCMAudioInfo : public PCMInfo {
39  public:
40  RTPPCMAudioInfo() = default;
41  virtual void begin(AudioBaseInfo info) { this->info = info; }
42  int getSampleRate() override { return info.sample_rate; }
43  int getChannels() override { return info.channels; }
44  int getSampleSizeBytes() override { return info.bits_per_sample / 8; };
45  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo ai) { info = ai; }
46 
47  protected:
48  AudioBaseInfo info;
49 };
50 
51 // /**
52 // * @brief Integration to https://github.com/pschatzmann/Micro-RTSP-Audio
53 // which
54 // * allows to use the AudioPlayer together with Micro-RTSP-Audio. As with the
55 // * regular AudioPlayer we still need to call copy which reads the data from
56 // the
57 // * source and decodes it to PCM data into a buffer. This buffer is then used
58 // as
59 // * IAudioSource for Micro-RTSP-Audio.
60 // *
61 // * @author Phil Schatzmann
62 // * @copyright GPLv3
63 // */
64

126 class RTSPSourceAudioStream : public IAudioSource {
127  public:
133  RTSPSourceAudioStream(AudioStream& stream) {
134  p_audiostream = &stream;
135  pcmInfo.begin(stream);
136  setFormat(new RTSPFormatPCM(pcmInfo));
137  }
138 
139  RTSPSourceAudioStream(AudioStream& stream, RTSPFormat& format) {
140  p_audiostream = &stream;
141  setFormat(&format);
142  }
143 
151  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info) {
152  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
153  p_audiostream->setAudioInfo(info);
154  }
155 
162  virtual int readBytes(void* dest, int byteCount) {
163  int result = 0;
164  LOGD("readDataTo: %d", byteCount);
165  if (active) {
166  result = p_audiostream->readBytes((uint8_t*)dest, byteCount);
167  }
168  return result;
169  }
173  virtual void start() {
174  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
175  p_audiostream->begin();
176  active = true;
177  };
181  virtual void stop() {
182  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
183  active = false;
184  p_audiostream->end();
185  };
186 
187  protected:
188  AudioStream* p_audiostream = nullptr;
189  bool active = true;
190  RTPStreamPCMInfo pcmInfo;
191 };
192 
200 class RTSPSourceStream : public IAudioSource {
201  public:
208  RTSPSourceStream(Stream& stream, AudioBaseInfo info) {
209  p_stream = &stream;
210  rtp_info.begin(info);
211  setFormat(new RTSPFormatPCM(rtp_info));
212  }
213 
220  RTSPSourceStream(Stream& stream, RTSPFormat& format) {
221  p_stream = &stream;
222  setFormat(&format);
223  }
224 
232  virtual void setAudioInfo(AudioBaseInfo info) {
233  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
234  rtp_info.setAudioInfo(info);
235  }
236 
243  virtual int readBytes(void* dest, int byteCount) {
244  int result = 0;
245  LOGD("readDataTo: %d", byteCount);
246  if (active) {
247  result = p_stream->readBytes((uint8_t*)dest, byteCount);
248  }
249  return result;
250  }
254  virtual void start() {
255  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
256  active = true;
257  };
261  virtual void stop() {
262  LOGI(LOG_METHOD);
263  active = false;
264  };
265 
266  protected:
267  Stream* p_stream = nullptr;
268  bool active = true;
269  RTPPCMAudioInfo rtp_info;
270 };
271
